alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Caddo and central Bossier Parishes, southeastern Harrison and northeastern Panola Counties through 500 AM CST... At 429 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blanchard to 6 miles north of Greenwood to 7 miles northwest of Elysian Fields to 10 miles south of Marshall. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Benton, Elysian Fields, Ferguson, Linton, Cross Lake, Bellevue, Jonesville and Red Chute. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
